Name: CA-Persona-{{PERSONA}}
Description: Dynamic security group based on attribute that only employees have

Name: CA-Persona-{{PERSONA}}-BaseProtection-Exclusions
Description: Exclusion for the Base Protection / IG for request / Access Review Monthly

Name: CA-Persona-{{PERSONA}}-IdentityProtection-Exclusions
Description: Exclusion for the Identity Protection / IG for request / Access Review Monthly

Name: CA-Persona-{{PERSONA}}-DataProtection-Exclusions
Description: Exclusion for the Data Protection / IG for request / Access Review Monthly

Name: CA-Persona-{{PERSONA}}-AppProtection-Exclusions
Description: Exclusion for the App Protection / IG for request / Access Review Monthly

Name: CA-Persona-{{PERSONA}}-AttackSurface-Exclusions
Description: Exclusion for the App Protection / IG for request / Access Review Monthly

Name: CA-Persona-{{PERSONA}}-Ring0
Description: Manually managed by Administrator(or responsable to conduct the deploy)

Name: CA-Persona-{{PERSONA}}-Ring1
Description: Manually managed by Administrator(or responsable to conduct the deploy)

Name: CA-Persona-{{PERSONA}}-Ring2
Description: Dynamic security group with criteria that result in about 1%

Name: CA-Persona-{{PERSONA}}-Ring3
Description: Dynamic security group with criteria that result in about 5-10%
